metadata.name: CHD-1 :: modal chord synth
metadata.description:
:: CHD-1 modal chord AM-synth  
fully interactive 3D lowtech brick model

FULLSCREEN INTERACTIVE VERSION:  
https://arweave.net/U_aZ_Y53ypyPtd0k6eYibY4e8pBfkTHZfFsIECDicAU/index.html


RTFM:

:: PADS - [play chords I though VIII]  
KBRD A,S,D,F,G,H,J,K

:: FADER - [chord intervals]  
(1st, 3rd, 5th, 7th, oct)  
click/tap & drag

:: BUTTONS TOP - [key]  
(C,D,E,F,G,A,B)  
KBRD 1,2,3,4,5,6,7

:: BUTTONS BOTTOM - [mode]  
(ionian, dorian ... locrian)  
KBRD Q,W,E,R,T,Y/Z,U

:: click/tap & drag device to explore different angles  
:: mousewheel/scroll to zoom in/out
